title: Revolution - Foundations, Figures & Philosophy
author: marsresident / Van Kush Family
overview: Core revolutionary theory: wealth/freedom distribution as drivers, profiles of historical revolutionaries, and essential readings with Eldridge Cleaver and Fred Hampton analysis

opening_quote.text: The state is suffering from two opposite vices, avarice and luxury; two plagues which, in the past, have been the ruin of every great empire.

core_theory.fundamental_truth: Revolution is simply Human Nature's response to oppression
core_theory.livy_wisdom: He would not anticipate those counsels which are rather bestowed by circumstances on men, than by men on circumstances

historical_examples.magna_carta: Signed because of self-centered Kings without best interests of nations

common_perceptions.problem: These ideas are often very vague
common_perceptions.requirement: Cannot have Revolution without Education about Societal structures and previous Revolutions

revolutionary_texts.title: Philosophy and Opinions of Marcus Garvey
revolutionary_texts.author: Marcus Garvey

mohamed_boudiaf.role: Leader of National Liberation Front (FLN) in Algeria
mohamed_boudiaf.context: Algeria was French Colony ruled from across Mediterranean
mohamed_boudiaf.french_failure: Mix of bureaucracy and force, failing to win hearts and minds
mohamed_boudiaf.strategy: FLN built slowly, eventually exploded using Guerilla warfare

gandhi.role: Primary part of Indian Independence movement
gandhi.context: Apartheid system - Indians considered racially inferior in own country
gandhi.note: Many Revolutionaries hung by British and Dutch imperialists
gandhi.strategy: Got Indians to disobey laws en masse
gandhi.mechanism: Clogged the system, caused Imperial state to fail

che_guevara.catalyst: Road trip on Motorcycle - saw plight of working class

pancho_villa.role: Commander of Northern forces in Mexican Revolution
pancho_villa.scale: Full blown armed conflict similar to American Civil War

ayatollah_khomeini.role: Leader of Iran after Iranian Revolution
ayatollah_khomeini.cause: Britain installed Shah to take control of Anglo-Persian Oil Company
ayatollah_khomeini.note: Anglo-Persian Oil Company now called British Petroleum (BP)

jean_paul_marat.context: 'Let them eat cake' - Marie Antoinette during economic crisis when people couldn't make bread
jean_paul_marat.unique_circumstance: Engineered Revolution from bathtub due to rare condition requiring him to stay in water
jean_paul_marat.revolution_character: Guillotines used to chop off heads of upper class
jean_paul_marat.end_marker: Did not end until advent of Photography showed beheadings in raw form

colonial_parallel.source: After studying Lenin, Marx, Mao, and Algerian Liberation Front
colonial_parallel.insight: Local Police departments = counterpart to occupying army of the French
colonial_parallel.colonial_structure: Administration had no power without organized guns of Army

black_community_parallel.collaborators: Indigenous class of Black bourgeois working with imperialists

colonial_parallel.three_elements: Apparitious businessmen, Politicians, and Gestapo (local Police)
colonial_parallel.collaborating_class: Doctors, Lawyers, Teachers, Black Boule - belong to mother country Political Parties

on_awareness.public_confusion: People think black people causing riots are making life miserable
on_awareness.real_cause: Pigs and their lynchers, power structure, bald headed businessmen at chamber of commerce
on_awareness.prediction: When they find out who's responsible, they'll be just like the Panthers

spirit_of_the_people.quote: Spirit of the people is greater than all Government's Technology
spirit_of_the_people.clarification: Not the buildings, not Congress physical structure - it's the psychological structure of racists in control
spirit_of_the_people.note: Want to challenge Reagan to a duel (1968)

the_question.setup: Pigs call me down, tell me I have a problem
the_question.response: How did it happen - your ancestors from Europe, mine from Africa, you telling ME I have a problem? Start from the beginning and run it down for me

on_organizing.solution: Organizing outside Republican and Democratic Parties
on_organizing.goal: Remove and destroy these parties, establish new Political Machinery
on_organizing.why_violence: Government not responsive to legitimate demands
on_organizing.who_being_organized: People never organized before - never belonged to NAACP or Core

fred_hampton_analysis.education_requirement: Can't form Revolution with no education

jomo_kenyatta.action: Formed Kenyan Revolution with no education
jomo_kenyatta.result: Said 'I'm your brother' then became the oppressor

papa_doc_haiti.result: Took over to be the oppressor

correct_understanding.right: Hate the oppressor, whether white, black, brown or yellow

fred_hampton_analysis.education_purpose: To find out what it's going to be in the finale
fred_hampton_analysis.on_castro: No one in this room can judge if Castro is going to be a Revolutionary
fred_hampton_analysis.warning: Without education people will steal money because they won't understand it's the people's thing anyway
fred_hampton_analysis.progression_risk: Poor → want something → want more → capitalists → black imperialists

quiz_questions.q: What are the actual drivers of Revolution according to @marsresident?
quiz_questions.a: Wealth Distribution and Freedom Distribution in Society - Revolution is Human Nature's response to oppression
quiz_questions.explanation: Not good ideas or right leaders, but imbalance creates revolutions

quiz_questions.q: What did Eldridge Cleaver identify as the parallel between Algeria and Black communities?
quiz_questions.a: Local Police = occupying army, Black community turned into market and source of cheap labor
quiz_questions.explanation: Three elements: businessmen, politicians, police working with Black bourgeois

quiz_questions.q: Why did Fred Hampton say Jomo Kenyatta and Papa Doc failed?
quiz_questions.a: No education - they became the oppressors themselves
quiz_questions.explanation: Without education, you hate wrong target and become what you fought

quiz_questions.q: How did Jean-Paul Marat engineer the French Revolution?
quiz_questions.a: From a bathtub - he had a rare condition requiring him to stay in water
quiz_questions.explanation: Revolution ended when photography showed beheadings in raw form

quiz_questions.q: What did Cleaver say was greater than all government technology?
quiz_questions.explanation: It's not physical structures oppressing people, it's psychological structure of racists
